metadata.title: CVE-2023-45920 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Xfig v3.2.8 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference whencalling XGetWMHints(). NOTE: this is disputed because it is not expectedthat an X application should continue to run when there is arbitraryanomalous behavior from the X server or window manager.

criterions.comment: xfig package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
